title: Regulation (EEC) No 668/74 of the Council of 28 March 1974 amending Regulation (EEC) No 922/72 concerning the general rules for granting aid in respect of silkworms
header:
REGULATION (EEC) No 668/74 OF THE COUNCIL  of 28 March 1974  amending Regulation (EEC) No 922/72 concerning the general rules for granting aid in respect of silkworms
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 922/72 the words "For the 1972/73 and 1973/74 rearing years" shall be deleted.

This Regulation shall be applicable from 1 April 1974.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 March 1974.
For the Council
The President
J. ERTL  (1)OJ No L 100, 27.4.1972, p. 1. (2)OJ No L 86, 31.3.1973, p. 34. (3)OJ No L 86, 31.3.1973, p. 34.
